name: The Magic Battle
description:
A Simple Card Game with fantastic cards drawed by children. Playable version with duel option wit computer AI. 

In developement!

Rules:

Choose one of the four houses (Magic, Earth, Ocean and Dark). Put 10 cards to the deck and start to play first chapter of Campaign. Drag a Card into a battle from your hand and start the duel with AI. Each card has Attack, Defence and Valor. If your card destroys the opponent card you get the points equal to card valor. The game has 10 rounds, after which wins the player with highest score. Read the special abilities of the cards to trick the opponent!

 How to Play:

Drag and Drop system form hand to battle slot.

Right Click to zoom in the card.

GOOD LUCK!
